text: Thomas McLain (19 January 1922 – December 1995) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:1995 deaths Category:People from Morpeth, Northumberland Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Ashington A.F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Northampton Town F.C. players Category:Oxford United F.C. players Category:Wellingborough Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Tommy McLain (footballer)
